Reference

All functions

bl() tl() br() tr() la() ta() ra() ba() image0() image1() text0()

Adjacency, for use in creating area based meshes

align_extent()

Crop an extent, snapped to the grain

cell_from_xy() cell_from_extent() extent_from_cell() rowcol_from_cell() xy_from_cell() x_from_cell() y_from_cell() col_from_cell() row_from_cell() cell_from_row() cell_from_col() cell_from_row_col() cell_from_rowcol_combine()

Cells

x_corner() y_corner() x_centre() y_centre() x_from_col() y_from_row() col_from_x() row_from_y() xy()

Coordinates

draw_extent()

Draw extent

extent_dim_to_gt()

Create geotransform from extent and dimension

extent_dimension()

Dimension for an aligned extent

extent_vrt()

Extents from VRT

from_xyz()

Derive a grid from XYZ points

geo_transform0()

Geo transform parameter creator

geo_world0() geotransform_to_world()

World file parameter creator

n_cell() x_res() y_res() n_row() n_col() xlim() ylim() x_min() x_max() y_min() y_max()

Grid

gt_dim_to_extent()

Determine extent from eotransform vector and dimension

intersect_extent()

Intersect extent

origin()

Origin of grid alignment

plot_extent()

Plot an extent

rasterio0()

GDAL RasterIO parameter creator

rasterio_idx() raster_sfio()

The sf RasterIO is the RasterIO window in a list format used by the sf package, it contains the same information, and is created by raster_sfio().

rasterio_to_sfio()

The sf/stars RasterIO list

sfio_to_rasterio()

sf package RasterIO from RasterIO window vector

snap_extent() buffer_extent()

Snap extent to resolution (buffer extent)

te() ts() ts_te()

Target size, extent

vaster_boundary()

Grid boundary in native resolution

vaster_listxyz()

Image xyz list

vaster_long()

Convert to long form coordinates

vcrop()

Virtual grid modification

world_to_geotransform()

Create geotransform from world vector
